pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Regression with Time-Varying Coefficients // Bayesian dynamic regression models where the regression coefficients can vary over time as random walks. Gaussian, Poisson, and binomial observations are supported. The Markov chain Monte Carlo computations are done using Hamiltonian Monte Carlo provided by Stan, using a state space representation of the model in order to marginalise over the coefficients for efficient sampling.
